# Monster Feats
## Overview
Most of the following feats apply specifically to monsters, although some player characters might qualify for them (particularly [[Craft Construct (Feat)|Craft Construct]]).


| **Feats** | **Prerequisites** | **Benefits** |
|---|---|---|
| [[Ability Focus (Bestiary 6 Apx)\|Ability Focus]] | Special Attack | +2 to the DC for all saving throws against a chosen special attack |
| [[Awesome Blow (Bestiary 6 Apx)\|Awesome Blow]] | Str 25, [[Power Attack (Feat)\|Power Attack]], [[Improved Bull Rush (Feat)\|Improved Bull Rush]], size Large or larger | Peform an awesome blow combat manuever |
| [[Improved Natural Attack (Feat)\|Improved Natural Attack]] | Natural weapon, base attack bonus +4 | Increase the damage of a natural weapon |
| Multiattack | Three or more natural attack | Secondary attack with natural weapons take a -2 penalty |
